philosophies.title: Addressing the Review Burden
philosophies.content:
The first challenge is the review burden. When executing long-running tasks, plans become too lengthy and difficult to understand. Even Claude Code might generate plans you can't fully grasp—especially when using it to explore unfamiliar territory.

Traditional plans are built for humans who imagine based on existing situations: they describe the current state and what actions will change it. But living in this context can cause hallucinations in large language models.
philosophies.enhancedContent: Tired of deciphering complex, sprawling plans? Intelligence Scale tackles the review burden head-on by structuring Claude Code's output into clear, manageable components. Our plugin transforms lengthy task plans into organized workflows with explicit dependencies, making it easy for developers to understand and verify progress without getting lost in details.

additions.label: Context Injection
additions.description: Injects skill context and session state on startup
additions.effect: Reduces review burden by pre-loading relevant context

highlight.title: Why Plans Fail
highlight.content: Traditional plans describe state transitions for humans who imagine outcomes. LLMs living in this context hallucinate because they lack grounded state awareness.

comparison.before: Describe current state → list changes → hope for the best
comparison.after: Structured template → verification gates → evidence-based execution

philosophies.title: Polished Plan Structure
philosophies.content: Intelligence Scale uses a refined plan structure designed to reduce review pressure on human beings. Plans are organized with clear task dependencies, explicit verification steps, and human verification gates for subjective decisions.
philosophies.enhancedContent: Experience cleaner, more maintainable plans with Intelligence Scale's refined structure. We organize tasks with clear dependencies, built-in verification steps, and human checkpoints that reduce cognitive load. This structured approach ensures you can quickly grasp what's been accomplished and what comes next in your development workflow.

additions.effect: Catches structural issues early in the planning phase

highlight.title: Structured Plan Template
highlight.content: Plans include task dependencies, verification steps, human verification gates, and explicit file paths—reducing ambiguity and review effort.

philosophies.title: Maximizing Task Parallelism
philosophies.content: The latest Opus model excels at executing concurrent tasks. Intelligence Scale prompts Claude Code to maximize task parallelism whenever possible, spawning subagents for independent work while respecting task dependencies.
philosophies.enhancedContent: Unlock Claude Code's full potential with intelligent parallel execution. Intelligence Scale prompts the AI to identify and spawn subagents for independent tasks, dramatically speeding up complex workflows. We maintain coordination between parallel workers while respecting resource constraints, giving you faster results without sacrificing reliability.

additions.description: Parallel task execution via subagent spawning

highlight.title: Automatic Parallelism
highlight.content: Every user prompt triggers a reminder to spawn subagents for independent tasks, ensuring maximum throughput without manual orchestration.

philosophies.title: Error Recovery
philosophies.content: While the latest Opus model has strong error resilience, recovering from errors still has common cases and edge cases that need attention. Intelligence Scale hints Claude Code to check the session plan when it encounters repeated errors, providing a structured path back to productive work.
philosophies.enhancedContent: Build resilient workflows with our smart error recovery system. Intelligence Scale helps Claude Code detect common failure patterns and provides structured recovery paths using specialized skills. Whether facing typical issues or edge cases, our plugin ensures your development process keeps moving forward with minimal disruption.

additions.label: Error Recovery Hook
additions.description: Triggers error recovery procedure on tool failures
additions.effect: Prevents goal drift by re-aligning to the session plan

highlight.title: Preventing Goal Drift
highlight.content: When tools fail, the natural instinct is to generalize or guess. Intelligence Scale forces re-alignment to the plan, preventing cascading errors.

comparison.before: Tool fails → guess new params → drift from goal → waste context
comparison.after: Tool fails → check plan → verify alignment → fix specific issue

philosophies.title: Plan Execution Audit
philosophies.content: When a plan is executed, some parts might not be fully implemented. The audit-plan skill verifies plan execution compliance, measuring the gap between the existing implementation and the goals described in the plan.
philosophies.enhancedContent: Ensure complete implementation with our automated audit system. The audit-plan skill measures the gap between planned goals and actual execution, identifying any missing components or deviations. This verification step gives you confidence that every aspect of your plan has been properly implemented before moving forward.

additions.label: Post-Subagent Audit
additions.description: Checks plan compliance when subagent work completes
additions.effect: Verifies each parallel task met its planned objectives

highlight.title: Compliance Verification
highlight.content: After execution, every task is verified against the plan with evidence-based status reporting: Done, Partial, or Missing.
